data.name: Vidar Demo
data.detailed_description:
In Vidar, every night a single NPC is killed. These deaths cause the story to evolve in random ways every time you play. In order to experience this in the demo, four people are killed right off the top - play the demo several times to see how the game evolves.

Possible areas in the demo include:
  • The Ice Cave
  • Erik's Cave
  • The Ice Lagoon
  • The Dark Cave
  • The Wolves' Den
  • The Water Cave
  • The Warzone

data.short_description: Vidar's demo covers one in-game day, with 7 different possible zones to explore. Play it a few times to see how random the story becomes!
